com.communote.server.core.property

Class PropertyAccessor<O extends Propertyable,P extends Property,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.server.core.property.PropertyAccessor<O,P,V>
  • Type Parameters:
    O - The type that got the properties
    P - The type of property
    V - The type of the value the property will handle
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BinaryPropertyAccessor, StringPropertyAccessor

    public abstract class PropertyAccessor<O extends Propertyable,P extends Property,V>
extends Object
    The Property Accessor provides means for setting and retrieving properties. The accessor implementations shouldn't be used directly. They are intended to be registered at the PropertyManagement instead.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

    • Constructor Detail

      • PropertyAccessor

        public PropertyAccessor(EventDispatcher eventDispatcher)
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • addToFilterDefinition

        public void addToFilterDefinition(String keyGroup,
                                  String key)
        Add a combination of a property key group and property key to the accessible properties.
        Parameters:
        keyGroup - the key group of the property that should be read and writable
        key - the key of the property that should be read and writable

      • assertLoadObject

        protected O assertLoadObject(Long id,
                             boolean writeAccess)
                      throws NotFoundException,
                             AuthorizationException
        Load and check the existence of the object. Also checks for valid read or write access.
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the object
        writeAccess - true if the current user needs to have write access to the object and its properties, false if only read access is required
        Returns:
        the object
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - in case the object has not been found
        AuthorizationException - in case the current user has not the requested access level to the object

      • assertReadAccess

        protected abstract void assertReadAccess(O object)
                                  throws AuthorizationException,
                                         NotFoundException
        Asserts valid read access for the given object.
        Parameters:
        object - The object.
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException - Thrown, when the read access to the object was denied.
        NotFoundException

      • assertValidForCreateAndUpdate

        protected boolean assertValidForCreateAndUpdate(String keyGroup,
                                                String key)
        Check that the group and key are both set and that the filters allow setting the property
        Parameters:
        keyGroup - the key group of the property
        key - the key of the property
        Returns:
        true if group and key are valid, false otherwise

      • assertWriteAccess

        protected abstract void assertWriteAccess(O object)
                                   throws AuthorizationException,
                                          NotFoundException
        Method to assert, that the current user has write access to the given object.
        Parameters:
        object - The object to assert write access for.
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException - Thrown, when the current user is not allowed to write to the given object.
        NotFoundException

      • getFilterDefintion

        protected PropertyAccessorFilterDefinition getFilterDefintion()
        Returns:
        the filter definition of this accessor

      • getGlobalObjectProperty

        public final P getGlobalObjectProperty(Long objectId,
                                       String key)
                                throws NotFoundException,
                                       AuthorizationException
        Get an global property, that is one with no key group (internal the key group will be global however).
        Parameters:
        objectId - the id of the object to get the property of
        key - the key of the property
        Returns:
        the property or null if the property does not exists or cannot be read because of a filter definition
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - in case there is not object to the given id.
        AuthorizationException - Thrown, when the user is not allowed to access.

      • getObjectId

        protected abstract Long getObjectId(O object)
        Parameters:
        object - the object the property is / will be assigned to
        Returns:
        the id of this object

      • getObjectProperty

        public final P getObjectProperty(Long objectId,
                                 String keyGroup,
                                 String key)
                          throws NotFoundException,
                                 AuthorizationException
        Get an object property for the given group and key
        Parameters:
        objectId - the id of the object to get the property of
        keyGroup - the key group of the property to get
        key - the key of the property
        Returns:
        the property or null if no such property exists or cannot be read because of a filter definition
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - in case there is not object to the given id.
        AuthorizationException - Thrown, when the user is not allowed to access.

      • getObjectPropertyUnfiltered

        public final P getObjectPropertyUnfiltered(Long objectId,
                                           String keyGroup,
                                           String key)
                                    throws NotFoundException,
                                           AuthorizationException
        Get an object property for the given group and key. The filter definition will not be checked.
        Parameters:
        objectId - the id of the object to get the property of
        keyGroup - the key group of the property to get
        key - the key of the property
        Returns:
        the property or null if no such property exists
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - in case there is not object to the given id.
        AuthorizationException - Thrown, when the user is not allowed to access.

      • getPropertyType

        public abstract PropertyType getPropertyType()
        Returns:
        the property type this accessor is handling

      • handleCreateNewProperty

        protected abstract P handleCreateNewProperty(O object)
        Create a new property and associate it with the object
        Parameters:
        object - the object to add a new property to
        Returns:
        the property created

      • handleGetObjectPropertyUnfiltered

        protected abstract P handleGetObjectPropertyUnfiltered(O object,
                                                       String keyGroup,
                                                       String key)
                                                throws AuthorizationException
        Get an object property for the given group and key
        Parameters:
        object - the object to get the property of
        keyGroup - the key group of the property to get
        key - the key of the propert no such property exists
        Returns:
        the property or null if no such property exists
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException - Thrown, when the user is not allowed to access the property.

                                          String keyGroup,
                                          String key)
                                   throws AuthorizationException
        Removes the property of an object
        Parameters:
        object - object to get the property of
        keyGroup - the key group of the property to get
        key - the key of the property
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException - Thrown, when the user is not allowed to access.

      • handleSetObjectProperty

        protected final P handleSetObjectProperty(O object,
                                          String keyGroup,
                                          String key,
                                          V value)
                                   throws AuthorizationException
        Adds a new, modifies or deletes an existing property.
        Parameters:
        object - the object for which the properties should be modified
        keyGroup - the key group of the property to set
        key - the key of the property
        value - the value of the property, can be null to delete the property
        Returns:
        the changed or created property. Null will be returned if the property did not exist and the provided value was null.
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException - Thrown, when the user is not allowed to access the object.

      • handleSetObjectPropertyUnfiltered

        protected P handleSetObjectPropertyUnfiltered(O object,
                                              String keyGroup,
                                              String key,
                                              V value)
                                       throws AuthorizationException
        Adds a new, modifies or deletes an existing property. The filter definition will not be checked.
        Parameters:
        object - the object for which the properties should be modified
        keyGroup - the key group of the property to set
        key - the key of the property
        value - the value of the property, can be null to delete the property
        Returns:
        the changed or created property. Null will be returned if the property did not exist and the provided value was null.
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException - Thrown, when the user is not allowed to access the object.

      • load

        protected abstract O load(Long id)
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the object
        Returns:
        the loaded object or null if it does not exist

        public void removeFromFilterDefinition(String keyGroup,
                                       String key)
        Remove a combination of a property key group and property key from the accessible properties.
        Parameters:
        keyGroup - the key group of the property
        key - the key of the property

                                       String keyGroup,
                                       String key)
                                throws NotFoundException,
                                       AuthorizationException
        Removes the property of an object
        Parameters:
        objectId - the id of the object to get the property of
        keyGroup - the key group of the property to get
        key - the key of the property
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - in case there is not object to the given id.
        AuthorizationException - Thrown, when the user is not allowed to access.

      • setGlobalObjectProperty

        public final P setGlobalObjectProperty(Long objectId,
                                       String key,
                                       V value)
                                throws NotFoundException,
                                       AuthorizationException
        Add a new, modify or delete an existing global property
        Parameters:
        objectId - the object to set the property on
        key - the key of the property
        value - the value of the property
        Returns:
        the changed or created property. Null will be returned if the property did not exist and the provided value was null.
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - in case there is not object to the given id.
        AuthorizationException - Thrown, when the user is not allowed to access.

      • setObjectProperty

        public final P setObjectProperty(Long objectId,
                                 String keyGroup,
                                 String key,
                                 V value)
                          throws NotFoundException,
                                 AuthorizationException
        Add a new, modify or delete an existing property. If the key group and key refer to a property that is not in the filter definition the property won't be stored.
        Parameters:
        objectId - the id of the object for which the properties should be modified
        keyGroup - the key group of the property to set
        key - the key of the property
        value - the value of the property, can be null to delete the property
        Returns:
        the changed or created property. Null will be returned if the property did not exist and the provided value was null.
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - in case there is no object for the given ID
        AuthorizationException - Thrown, when the user is not allowed to modify the object.

      • setObjectPropertyUnfiltered

        public final P setObjectPropertyUnfiltered(Long objectId,
                                           String keyGroup,
                                           String key,
                                           V value)
                                    throws NotFoundException,
                                           AuthorizationException
        Adds a new, modifies or deletes an existing property. The filter definition will not be checked.
        Parameters:
        objectId - the id of the object for which the properties should be modified
        keyGroup - the key group of the property to set
        key - the key of the property
        value - the value of the property, can be null to delete the property
        Returns:
        the changed or created property. Null will be returned if the property did not exist and the provided value was null.
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - in case there is no object for the given ID
        AuthorizationException - Thrown, when the user is not allowed to modify the object.

      • setPropertyValue

        protected abstract void setPropertyValue(P property,
                                         V value)
        Parameters:
        property - The property.
        value - The value.
